ExportedFolder.Name: 队友技能监控 更新:1月11日 5:36 需要：鲶鱼精邮差

Trigger.Name: 读条
Trigger.RegularExpression: \] 14:[A-Z0-9]{0,4}:(?<SourceName>.+?) starts using (?<AbilityName>生辰|Ascend|アセンド|复(活|生)|Raise|蘇生|赤复活|Verraise|ヴァルレイズ) on (?<TargetName>.+?)\.

Trigger.Name: 判定
Trigger.RegularExpression: \] 15:[A-Z0-9]{8}:(?<CasterName>.+?):[A-Z0-9]{0,4}:(?<AbilityName>生辰|Ascend|アセンド|复(活|生)|Raise|蘇生|赤复活|Verraise|ヴァルレイズ):[A-Z0-9]{8}:(?<TargetName>.+?):

Trigger.Name: 获取醒梦CD
Trigger.RegularExpression: \] 1A:[A-Z0-9]{8}:(?<CasterName>.+?) gains the effect of (醒梦|Lucid Dreaming|ルーシッドドリーム) from .+? for 21.00 Seconds.

Trigger.Name: 死而不僵
Trigger.RegularExpression: \] 1A:[A-Z0-9]{8}:(?<CasterName>.+?) gains the effect of (?<AbilityName>死而不僵) from .+? for 10.00 Seconds.

Trigger.Name: 死而不僵解除
Trigger.RegularExpression: \] 1.:[A-Z0-9]{8}:(?<CasterName>.+?) loses the effect of (?<AbilityName>死而不僵) from

Trigger.Name: 巨星字幕提醒
Trigger.RegularExpression: \] 1A:[A-Z0-9]{8}:(?<CasterName>.+?) gains the effect of (?<AbilityName>巨星主宰) from .+? for 10.00 Seconds.

Trigger.Name: CD转好之后发送提醒
Trigger.RegularExpression: 00:0039:(戦闘開始！|Engage!|战斗开始！)|01:Changed Zone to

Trigger.Name: CD转好之后发送提醒
Trigger.RegularExpression: 00:0039:(戦闘開始！|Engage!|战斗开始！)|01:Changed Zone to

Trigger.Name: 获取即刻CD
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^\[\d\d:\d\d:\d\d\.\d\d\d\] 1A:[A-Z0-9]{8}:(?<CasterName>.+?) gains the effect of (即刻咏唱|Swiftcast|迅速魔) from .+? for 10.00 Seconds.$

Action.JsonPayloadExpression: /${func:tolower:${var:Souma_Attack_Role_Channel}} BOSS对${var:${TargetName}职业}的普攻造成了${numeric:hex2dec(${func:substring(0,4):${func:padleft(48,8):${damage}}})}点伤害，注意仇恨！

Trigger.Name: 判定
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^\[\d\d:\d\d:\d\d\.\d\d\d\] 15:[A-Z0-9]{0,8}:(?<CasterName>伊甸|至尊伊甸|伊甸守护者|虚无行者|厄瑞玻斯的巨腕|利维亚桑|泰坦|极大泰坦):[A-Z0-9]{0,8}:(?<AbilityName>(?!Unknown_).+?):

Action.JsonPayloadExpression: /${func:tolower:${var:Souma_Persecute_Teammates_Channel}} ${CasterName}的龙神附体居然没有打死星核爆，他在想什么啊！

Action.VariableName: 迫害召唤_死亡轮回数量

Action.JsonPayloadExpression: /${func:tolower:${var:Souma_Persecute_Teammates_Channel}} ${CasterName}本次巴哈：真龙波（${var:迫害召唤_真龙波数量}/8） 死亡轮回（${var:迫害召唤_死亡轮回数量}/2）

Trigger.Name: 真龙波
Trigger.RegularExpression: \] 00:402b:亚灵神巴哈姆特咏唱了“真龙波”。

Trigger.Name: 死亡轮回
Trigger.RegularExpression: \] 00:402b:亚灵神巴哈姆特发动了“死亡轮回”。

Action.VariableName: 迫害召唤_死亡轮回数量
迫害召唤_死亡轮回数量

Action.JsonPayloadExpression: /${func:tolower:${var:Souma_Persecute_Teammates_Channel}} ${CasterName}本次不死鸟：赤焰（${var:迫害召唤_赤焰数量}/8） 天启（${var:迫害召唤_天启数量}/2）
